job_description:
Accountability: 
a.	Regional responsibility for purchase invoice receipt, matching, payment, supplier query handling and resolution.
b.	Use AP systems to administer all purchase invoices. Post and match invoices, filing and archiving.
c.	Monitor payment runs to ensure discounts on supplies are taken in line with local business practices.  
d.	Ensure employee expenses are captured and reimbursed in a timely manner.  
e.	Provide information to the Team Leader to assist purchasing with vendor negotiation, as well as to determine trends of outgoing cash flow. 
f.	Work with purchasing department on a day-to-day basis to resolve supplier queries.
g.	Contribute information to ascertain vendor performance monitoring and approval.
Qualifications:
a.	Willing to be placed in Bogor, West Java.
b.	Fluent in English both written and spoken.
c.	Min.D3 from Finance, Accounting, Economic, or Management majors.
d.	Familiar with Account Payable Applications.
